CRF layer.from sentence: Finally , by adding CRF layer for joint decoding we achieve significant improvements over BLSTM - CNN models for both POS tagging and NER on all metrics .

traditional statistical models.from sentence: Comparing with traditional statistical models , our system achieves state - of - the - art accuracy , obtaining 0.05 % improvement over the previously best reported results by .
